title: Residential Rental Agreement
obligations: Lessee shall pay monthly rent by the 5th.
Lessee must maintain the premises in good condition.
Lessor shall provide 30 days notice before termination.
Lessee agrees to comply with local regulations.
Late fee applies after the 5th of each month.

clauses.title: Rent and Payment
clauses.originalText: Rent is due on the 1st of each month. Late fee will apply after the 5th.
clauses.simplifiedText: Pay monthly rent on time; late payments incur a fee.

clauses.title: Termination
clauses.originalText: Either party may terminate with a 30-day written notice. Immediate termination on material breach.
clauses.simplifiedText: You can end the lease with 30 days notice; serious breach ends it immediately.

clauses.title: Liability and Indemnity
clauses.originalText: Lessee shall indemnify Lessor against claims arising from misuse of the premises.
clauses.simplifiedText: Tenant covers costs if misuse leads to claims against landlord.

summary: This rental agreement outlines rent due dates, termination rules, and liability. Tenants must comply with local laws and maintain the property.
notes: Late fees may add up quickly.
